title: App crashes on login when using Rinkeby (stickerMarketAddress error)

labels.name: priority 2: medium
labels.description: an issue that is not severely affecting the overall app, it may interfere with some users users expe

body:
# Bug Report

## Description

When switching to the Rinkeby network, trying to log back in crashes

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11926403/175964288-9e93428c-9677-430f-ae7c-95079bb2b56b.png)

More logs:
```
ERR 2022-06-27 10:21:28.312-04:00 rpc response error                         topics="rpc" tid=25504 file=core.nim:29 err="\nstatus-go error [methodName:settings_notificationsGetExMuteAllMessages, code:-32000, message:sql: no rows in result set ]\n"
ERR 2022-06-27 10:21:28.313-04:00 reading exemptions setting error:          topics="settings-service" tid=25504 file=service.nim:868 id=0x02c56e95850bba4c3f411394a53487fc1c83aec1ff8176e63278c9c63ae2d8a394 errDesription="\nstatus-go error [methodName:settings_notificationsGetExMuteAllMessages, code:-32000, message:sql: no rows in result set ]\n"
DBG 2022-06-27 10:21:28.314-04:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=25504 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=stickers_recent
DBG 2022-06-27 10:21:28.315-04:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=25504 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=stickers_installed
ERR 2022-06-27 10:21:28.318-04:00 rpc response error                         topics="rpc" tid=27252 file=core.nim:29 err="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wallet_getTokens, code:-32000, message:no tokens for this network ]\n"
ERR 2022-06-27 10:21:28.319-04:00 error fetching tokens:                     topics="wallet-account-service" tid=27252 file=async_tasks.nim:114 message="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wallet_getTokens, code:-32000, message:no tokens for this network ]\n" chainId=42161
DBG 2022-06-27 10:21:28.319-04:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=25504 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=stickers_stickerMarketAddress
DBG 2022-06-27 10:21:28.320-04:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=27252 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wallet_getCustomTokens
ERR 2022-06-27 10:21:28.321-04:00 rpc response error                         topics="rpc" tid=25504 file=core.nim:29 err="\nstatus-go error [methodName:stickers_stickerMarketAddress, code:-32000, message:not available for chainID ]\n"
DBG 2022-06-27 10:21:28.322-04:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=27252 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wallet_fetchPrices
INF 2022-06-27 10:21:28.322-04:00 shutting down...                           topics="status-app" tid=25504 file=nim_status_client.nim:134
DBG 2022-06-27 10:21:28.958-04:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=27252 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wallet_fetchPrices
DBG 2022-06-27 10:21:29.093-04:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=27252 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wallet_fetchPrices
DBG 2022-06-27 10:21:29.213-04:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=27252 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wallet_getTokensBalancesForChainIDs
DBG 2022-06-27 10:21:29.536-04:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=27252 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=eth_getBalance
DBG 2022-06-27 10:21:29.560-04:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=27252 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=eth_getBalance
ERR 2022-06-27 10:21:29.650-04:00 rpc response error                         topics="rpc" tid=27252 file=core.nim:29 err="\nstatus-go error [methodName:eth_getBalance, code:-32700, message:403 Forbidden: {\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"id\":1,\"error\":{\"code\":-32002,\"message\":\"project ID does not have access to optimism l2\",\"data\":{\"see\":\"https://infura.io/dashboard\"}}} ]\n"
ERR 2022-06-27 10:21:29.651-04:00 error getting balance                      topics="wallet-account-service" tid=27252 file=async_tasks.nim:157 message="\nstatus-go error [methodName:eth_getBalance, code:-32700, message:403 Forbidden: {\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"id\":1,\"error\":{\"code\":-32002,\"message\":\"project ID does not have access to optimism l2\",\"data\":{\"see\":\"https://infura.io/dashboard\"}}} ]\n"
DBG 2022-06-27 10:21:29.651-04:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=27252 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=eth_getBalance
ERR 2022-06-27 10:21:29.782-04:00 rpc response error                         topics="rpc" tid=27252 file=core.nim:29 err="\nstatus-go error [methodName:eth_getBalance, code:-32700, message:403 Forbidden: {\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"id\":1,\"error\":{\"code\":-32002,\"message\":\"project ID does not have access to arbitrum l2\",\"data\":{\"see\":\"https://infura.io/dashboard\"}}} ]\n"
ERR 2022-06-27 10:21:29.783-04:00 error getting balance                      topics="wallet-account-service" tid=27252 file=async_tasks.nim:157 message="\nstatus-go error [methodName:eth_getBalance, code:-32700, message:403 Forbidden: {\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"id\":1,\"error\":{\"code\":-32002,\"message\":\"project ID does not have access to arbitrum l2\",\"data\":{\"see\":\"https://infura.io/dashboard\"}}} ]\n"
make: *** [Makefile:597: run-windows] Error 1
```

### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: latest master (`70383a51bd77debe2402c9609c584f92b96c7ab7`)
- Operating System: Windows 10
This will be fixed by latest PR of multi network: https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/6271
Closing as there is no more unique network selection
